scripts.synth:dev: npm run build && cdk synth -c environment=dev
scripts.synth:staging: npm run build && cdk synth -c environment=staging
scripts.synth:prod: npm run build && cdk synth -c environment=production
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy --all -c environment=dev --require-approval broadening
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && cdk deploy --all -c environment=staging --require-approval broadening
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy --all -c environment=production --require-approval broadening
scripts.diff:dev: npm run build && cdk diff --all -c environment=dev
scripts.diff:staging: npm run build && cdk diff --all -c environment=staging
scripts.diff:prod: npm run build && cdk diff --all -c environment=production
